html: Callum wanted for us to meet and so did I. We spent some time together over at my place with his family and it was really enjoyable. I hope you had a great time too, Callum. And I hope you liked the specially dedicated pair of boots as well.pic.twitter.com/I8ZCibnKQb
text: Callum wanted for us to meet and so did I. We spent some time together over at my place with his family and it was really enjoyable. I hope you had a great time too, Callum. And I hope you liked the specially dedicated pair of boots as well.pic.twitter.com/I8ZCibnKQb

html: Callum quería conocerme y yo a él. Lo invité a casa junto a su familia y tuvimos un lindo encuentro. Espero que lo hayas pasado bien, amigo. Y que disfrutes de mis botas especialmente firmadas para vos.pic.twitter.com/MZfCcloNFD

html: I truly wish I could have joined you on Etihad today, @YayaToure. It was a special day, and I'm glad your teammates and the people could show you the recognition and affection you deserve. It was an honour to have shared so many years and achievements together, mate! #Legend pic.twitter.com/EdElIrGWxa
text: I truly wish I could have joined you on Etihad today, @YayaToure. It was a special day, and I'm glad your teammates and the people could show you the recognition and affection you deserve. It was an honour to have shared so many years and achievements together, mate! #Legend pic.twitter.com/EdElIrGWxa

html: Me hubiera gustado mucho haber podido acompañarte hoy en el Etihad @YayaToure. Un día especial en el que recibiste todo lo que mereces: el reconocimiento y el cariño de tus compañeros y la gente. Un honor haber compartido tantos años y logros con vos amigo! #Legend pic.twitter.com/3aXshVHl0i
text: Me hubiera gustado mucho haber podido acompañarte hoy en el Etihad @YayaToure. Un día especial en el que recibiste todo lo que mereces: el reconocimiento y el cariño de tus compañeros y la gente. Un honor haber compartido tantos años y logros con vos amigo! #Legend pic.twitter.com/3aXshVHl0i
